00032 class SF_Facebook extends SF_Platform
00033 {
00037     function __construct( $sBaseUrl, $sAppName, $sAppId, $sAPIKey, $sAPISecret )
00038     {
00039         //  Call the base class
00040         parent::__construct( $sBaseUrl, $sAppName, $sAppId, $sAPIKey, $sAPISecret );
00041 
00042         $this->m_sNSPrefix = "fb";
00043 
00044         $this->m_oPFAPI = new Facebook( $sAPIKey, $sAPISecret );
00045         $this->m_sPFUserId = $this->m_oPFAPI->user;
00046 
00047         //  Set id into Sonetrix
00048         if ( $this->m_oSntx )
00049             $this->m_oSntx->setPFUserId( $this->m_sPFUserId );
00050 
00051         //  Instantiate FB specifics
00052         $this->m_sAppPage = "http://www.facebook.com/apps/application.php?id=" . $this->AppId;
00053         $this->m_sAppUrl = "http://apps.facebook.com/" . $this->AppName . "/";
00054         $this->m_sAppCallbackUrl = $this->AppUrl;
00055     }
00056 
00060     public function renderGoogleAnalytics( $sPage = "", $iTitle = 0 )
00061     {
00062         if ( null != $this->GAKey )
00063             echo "<fb:google-analytics uacct=\"{$this->GAKey}\" />";
00064     }

00086     {
00087         $this->m_oPFAPI->require_login();
00088         $this->m_sPFUserId = $this->m_oPFAPI->user;
00089 
00090         //  Set id into Sonetrix

00092             $this->m_oSntx->setPFUserId( $this->m_sPFUserId );

00175     {
00176         try
00177         {

00181         {
00182         }

00188     public function getUserInfo( $sFields = "", $sUIDs = null )
00189     {
00190         return( $this->m_oPFAPI->api_client->users_getInfo( ( $sUIDs == null ? $this->m_sPFUserId : $sUIDs ), ( $sFields == "" ? "birthday,current_location,sex" : $sFields ) ) );
00191     }
